scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Charles Dudley Warner to "Dear Mr. Hatfield" writing . . . I wish we could be with you on your birthday. For myself I hate my own, but there is a melancholy satisfaction in celebrating that of our friends. But one thing you have got to do is look older, or you will not get credit for what you are, (electrostatic copy).
